thread.title: Floyd Mayweather Can Thank the Falcons for Winning $25,000 in a Bet
thread.title_full: Floyd Mayweather Can Thank the Falcons for Winning $25,000 in a Bet

author: Jose Martinez
title: Floyd Mayweather Can Thank the Falcons for Winning $25,000 in a Bet
text:
0 Image via USA Today Sports/Kim Klement The rich keep getting richer. Prior to Sunday's NFC Championship Game between the Atlanta Falcons and Green Bay Packers , Floyd Mayweather placed a $30,000 bet on the first half spread, and came away with an additional $25,000 when the Falcons took a 24-0 lead over the Packers at halftime. 
Just made $25,000 in 30 minutes. The retired life. A photo posted by Floyd Mayweather (@floydmayweather) on Jan 22, 2017 at 1:42pm PST While it was an impressive move by Mayweather, it didn't come close to his most lucrative winning bet...of the weekend! On Friday, Money Mayweather made $45,000 when he took the Golden State Warriors as 5.5-point favorites over the Houston Rockets . The Warriors cruised their way to the 125-108 victory. A photo posted by Floyd Mayweather (@floydmayweather) on Jan 22, 2017 at 3:01pm PST Related
